comments:
If you browse to a large directory of icons, and select and close the editor
before the editor finishes loading all of the icons in that directory, a large
number of copies of the following exception show up in the .log file:


!ENTRY org.eclipse.ui 4 4 May 27, 2004 11:02:35.976
!MESSAGE Unhandled event loop exception
!ENTRY org.eclipse.ui 4 0 May 27, 2004 11:02:35.977
!MESSAGE Widget is disposed
!STACK 0

        at java.lang.Throwable.<init>(Throwable.java)
        at java.lang.Throwable.<init>(Throwable.java)
        at org.eclipse.swt.SWTException.<init>(SWTException.java:73)
        at org.eclipse.swt.SWT.error(SWT.java:2689)

fixed, minor problem in Icon/ImageDcreeDisplay and uncaught SWTExceptions
1.0M2 is out, so these are now closed in M2.
